attributes.additional_details:
What we are now getting with all these cutbacks are the poorest in society being penalised for the way this country as been run.
The blame for all these troubles lies soley with these executives, but they are not the ones suffering.
When a tree is found to be struggling to stay upright you do not cut the roots, you cut the top.
The highest Public Sector Executive salaries needs to be reduced to no more than £98.510 and pro rata for staff under them..
